scripts.build: sh -c 'if test -d src; then yarn exec tsc --build; else echo "No src directory found, skipping build"; fi'
scripts.lint: sh -c 'if test -d src; then eslint src --ext .ts; else echo "No src directory found, skipping lint"; fi'
scripts.typecheck: sh -c 'if test -d src; then yarn exec tsc --noEmit; else echo "No src directory found, skipping typecheck"; fi'
